CustomField.description: This is the response from the Client API response for the Work Order Details information, there is no formatting in the response. May need to reformat the JSON on a formatter software or tool
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the response from the Client API response for the Work Order Details information, there is no formatting in the response. May need to reformat the JSON on a formatter software or tool
CustomField.label: Int - PO Detail JSON
